name: Occurrence at JCR Outpost
description: A scientific mission in Antarctica goes awry when something is released from beneath the ice! Who is friend? Who is foe? Only you can solve the mystery of the Occurrence at JCR Outpost!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Or Later Processor: Intel 2 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 30 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A fun, satisfying homage to John Carpenter's The Thing. It's very short (less than an hour and a half) but definitely worth your time.
